document_data.caption: A map of Michaca, the City of Gold
document_data.name: Michaca
document_data.mainbody: '''Michaca''', also known as the '''City of Gold''', was a city of [[Azuposi]] situated in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: The concept of Michaca was conceived by [[Tapeyzin|Chief Tapeyzin]] when he saw that men had been corrupted by personal greed caused by the abundance of gold in the area, and he set about using the excess wealth to create a fitting tribute to the [[Maztican pantheon|gods]] in the shape of a city, rather than for personal gain.
